name: Alpha Five Set Data Dictionary Index File

description: When two or more tables are linked together in Alpha Five, a set, which consists of a SEX, SEM, and SET file is created. These files make up the set data dictionary for the two or more tables linked together. The dictionary stores reports, forms, and any other objects linked to the set. You should keep your SEX files with the other SET and SEM Set Data Dictionary files in order for Alpha to easily find all of the elements and their pieces.
NOTE: In 2013, Alpha Five became Alpha Anywhere.

common_filenames.description: [Name of your set].sex - When you create the set, the SEX file will be created with the same name as the related SET and SEM files.
